reviews.text: Patti was out of town visiting the newest grandchild, as I was in town meeting my first. Jim was in charge, and he ran up and down three flights of stairs like a teenager! Very sweet, he is a terrific baker (just want to give him the proper attribution). Many reviewers have said Patti is the baker in the house, and Jim says he's the only one. His blueberry muffins won everyone over.
reviews.title: A cozy room at the top of the stairs
Great place!
reviews.text: The other folks staying were interesting, as well - one, a baritone who lives at Park Lane 3 days a week while teaching a class at the Boston Conservatory and two teachers from Burgos with whom Jim and I practiced our Spanish. Altogether, a lovely time - although if you're in the cozy room at the top of the stairs, make sure to duck often! I did bump my head several times.
Me and my husband stayed at Park Lane for a week, we came to Newton to check the neighborhood and to find a house to rent before we will move to to this area.
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay! Extraordinary Hospitality.

reviews.text: The hospitality in Park Lane was amazing! - it was like staying with a close family.
reviews.title: Surprisingly Satisfying Stay!

reviews.text: Patti and Jim helped us with everything we need and beyond . They truly were willing to help us with any issue.
reviews.title: Above and beyond
